typeDescription.name: type.Sentence
typeDescription.description: Identifier for the sentence being annotated.

featureDescription.name: sentenceId
featureDescription.description: The actual ID of the string

typeDescription.name: type.Gene
typeDescription.description: A gene or protein mention within the text to be annotated

typeDescription.name: type.Token
typeDescription.description: An individual word token within a text separated by spaces and assigned with a part of speech.

featureDescription.name: wordToken
featureDescription.description: An individual word in the text.

featureDescription.name: tagPOS
featureDescription.description: The part of speech of the wordToken
